page.title: 10Rt.Hon.Boscawen, M.P.
page.content: The Rt. Hon. Boscawen started his career in politics in the early 1950's.His family had been involved in politics for a very long time and his interest came from there.His mother was the 1st woman vice_chairman of the Conservative party.He started as a {Government backbencher}in 1970,and specialised in social security '74_79. He was made a{Whip}in 1974.He started as an assistant Whip,but has now become the second most important Whip,that is the{Vice_Chamberlain of {the Queen's Household.}He has been in this Parliamentary constituency for over 15 years,even though the boundaries have changed several times.He has been living in his present residence, Ivythorn Manor, since 1970 when he first became an M.P.
